data.eml:eml: Generic reclassification of species formerly included in Rhantus Dejean (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae, Colymbetinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Balke, Michael, Hájek, Jiří, Hendrich, Lars (2017): Generic reclassification of species formerly included in Rhantus Dejean (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae, Colymbetinae). Zootaxa 4258 (1): 91-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4258.1.7
